suggest.silverstripe/geoip: Native Silverstripe way to work out the customer country. Make sure this work on your server, before installing it - otherwise it is useless.
suggest.sunnysideup/cloudflaregeoip: Extends Geoip if you are using cloudflare
suggest.silverstripe/restfulserver: Adds restful server functionality to your e-commerce site (creates an API for your e-commerce application, allowing third-parties to tap into your e-commerce data)
suggest.silverstripe-australia/grouped-cms-menu: merge e-commerce cms menu items for into one
suggest.micmania1/silverstripe-lumberjack: great way to take product and product groups out of the sitetree
